page.title: 02Cambo
page.content: Cambo is a day out for all the family. It has a BMX track for the kids everything is supplied such as helmet, safety pads and bike. For the toddlers there is a play area with piglets, calves and lambs. At feeding time the toddlers get to feed the baby animals with baby bottles. Also there is a chute, climbing frame and rope swings inside the play area. Outside there are rabbits and hens running about and full grown sheep and cows. There are also wild bores but they are caged off. There is a barn filled with old fashioned farm equipment. There is a nature trail which leads to the shore. If you get hungry there is a restaurant and a tea room. There is a Gift shop which sells souvenirs.
